title.value: Hardiness and its influence on the productivity of strawberry varieties in the conditions of the north-east of Belarus
Зимостойкость и ее влияние на продуктивность сортов земляники садовой в условиях северо-востока Беларуси

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Pugacheva, R.M., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: We have presented results of research into 18 varieties of strawberry of different geographic origin in the conditions of the north-east of Belarus. We have estimated hardiness and productivity of strawberry plants. We have established the cause of its low hardiness, and sources of high hardiness and productivity for selection. As a result of conducted research, we have chosen the most stable to unfavourable conditions of winter period varieties: Surprise Olimpiade, Kent, Udarnitsa, Elkat, Solovushka, Zenga Zengana.
